summary: A comprehensive test suite for the MQTT-based climate (HVAC) integration in Home Assistant, verifying correct handling of availability payloads, operation modes, temperature limits and reporting, auxiliary heat and away modes, fan and swing settings, hold functionality, power commands, target temperature processing, templating, configuration parameters, feature detection, pessimistic states, and malformed attribute scenarios.
business_intent: Ensure the MQTT climate component functions reliably and conforms to expected behavior, preventing regressions and supporting quality assurance during development of Home Assistant's climate integration.
